titleStmt.title: The anatomie of conscience Or a threefold reuelation of those three most secret bookes: 1. The booke of Gods prescience. 2. The booke of mans conscience. 3. The booke of life. In a sermon preached at the generall assises holden at Derby, in Lent last. 1623. By Immanuel Bourne ...
titleStmt.author: Bourne, Immanuel, 1590-1672.

titleStmt.title: The anatomie of conscience Or a threefold reuelation of those three most secret bookes: 1. The booke of Gods prescience. 2. The booke of mans conscience. 3. The booke of life. In a sermon preached at the generall assises holden at Derby, in Lent last. 1623. By Immanuel Bourne ...
titleStmt.author: Bourne, Immanuel, 1590-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. E[ld] and M. F[lesher] for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be sold at his shop neere S. Austins Gate, at the signe of the Pyde Bull,

notesStmt.note: The words "1. The booke of God prescience. .. 3. The booke of life." are bracketed together on the title page.
